content: Guests and Users cannot be assigned as Room managers. Only Room and {{productName}} admins are suitable for the specified role.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when users or guests are assigned as room managers. It informs the user that only certain admins (room and {{productName}}) are suitable for this role. This message appears in an invite panel and alerts users about accessibility restrictions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'لا يمكن تعيين الضيوف والمستخدمين كمديري غرف' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would be 'لا يمكن تكليف الضيوف والمستخدمين بدور مديري غرف'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لا يمكن تكليف الضيوف والمستخدمين بدور مديري غرف.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'الدور المحدد' (the specified role) is slightly awkward. A more common and natural phrasing would be 'هذا الدور'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: هذا الدور

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'administrator' (administratorları) is a direct transliteration and might not be the most natural or clear way to express 'manager' in Azerbaijani. A more contextually appropriate term could be used, potentially depending on the product's specific terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a more natural Azerbaijani equivalent for 'manager', such as 'rüsvətçi' or a similar term that better reflects the role's responsibilities within the product's context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable `{{productName}}` is correctly placed, but the surrounding text should be carefully reviewed for proper punctuation and flow when the variable is replaced with the actual product name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Double-check the spacing and punctuation around `{{productName}}` to ensure clarity and readability after substitution.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'suitable for the specified role' is a bit clunky in German. A more natural phrasing would be 'geeignet für diese Rolle'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gäste und Benutzer können nicht als Raum-Manager zugewiesen werden. Nur Raum- und {{productName}}-Administratoren sind für diese Rolle geeignet.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "suitable for the specified role" is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Greek. A more natural phrasing would be 'επιλέξιμοι για αυτόν τον ρόλο'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Οι Επισκέπτες και οι Χρήστες δεν μπορούν να οριστούν ως διαχειριστές Δωματίων. Μόνο οι διαχειριστές Δωματίων και {{productName}} είναι επιλέξιμοι για αυτόν τον ρόλο.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Vieraita' is German for 'Guests'. The English term 'Guests' should be translated to a Finnish equivalent that means 'Guests'. A better translation would be 'Kävijöitä'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kävijöitä ja käyttäjiä ei voida asettaa huoneen johtajiksi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'jouer le rôle spécifié' is a slightly awkward translation of 'suitable for the specified role'. It implies 'playing' the role rather than 'being appropriate' for the role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Les invités et les utilisateurs ne peuvent pas être désignés comme gestionnaires de salle. Seuls les administrateurs de salle et de {{productName}} sont éligibles pour ce rôle.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Սենյակի մենեջերներ" is a literal translation of 'Room managers' but might sound unnatural in Armenian. A more idiomatic translation might be 'Ժամանակացույցի վարիչներ' if 'Room' refers to a scheduling room or 'Դահլիճի վարչակազմողներ' if it's a physical room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Ժամանակացույցի վարիչներ' or 'Դահլիճի վարչակազմողներ' depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'suitable for the specified role' is translated as 'その役割に適しています'. While not incorrect, it's a bit stiff and formal. A more natural and conversational translation might be better.  Consider something like 'その役割にふさわしい' (suitable for that role) or 'その役割を担える' (capable of fulfilling that role).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ゲストおよびユーザーはルーム管理者に指定できません。ルーム管理者および{{productName}}管理者だけが、その役割を担えます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "지정된 역할에 적합합니다" is a bit stiff and not the most natural way to express suitability. A more natural translation for 'suitable for the specified role' would be something along the lines of '해당 역할에 적합합니다' or '해당 역할에 적임입니다'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 게스트와 사용자를 룸 관리자로 할당할 수 없습니다. 룸 및 {{productName}} 관리자만 해당 역할에 적합합니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເທົ່ານັ້ນ' (teo nan) is unnecessarily used. It's redundant and doesn't add meaning. While not technically incorrect, it makes the sentence sound awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: แขກ ແລະຜູ້ໃຊ້ບໍ່ສາມາດຖືກມອບຫມາຍເປັນຜູ້ຈັດການຫ້ອງໄດ້ ພຽງແຕ່ຜູ້ບໍລິຫານຫ້ອງ ແລະ {{productName}} ສາມາດຖືກຕ້ອງສໍາລັບບົດບາດທີ່ກໍາຫນົດໄວ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Norādītajai lomai ir piemērota tikai..." is a somewhat awkward and indirect translation of "Only... are suitable for the specified role." A more natural Latvian phrasing would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lomai ir piemēroti tikai telpas un {{productName}} administratori.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "opgegeven rol vervullen" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "specified role". A more idiomatic translation would be 'deze rol'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gasten en Gebruikers kunnen niet worden toegewezen als Kamerbeheerders. Alleen Kamer en {{productName}} beheerders kunnen deze rol vervullen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a semicolon (;) where a comma (,) might be more natural in this context. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nie można przypisać roli menedżera pokoju gościom ani użytkownikom. Tylko administratorzy pokoi i {{productName}} mogą przyjąć daną rolę.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Utilizadors' is misspelled. It should be 'Utilizadores'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Utilizadores

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow.  'Apenas os administradores Room e {{productName}} são adequados para a função especificada' is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Apenas administradores Room e {{productName}} são adequados para essa função.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "assigned as" is not accurate. "Desemnate" implies a designation rather than an assignment. "Atribuiți" would be a more accurate translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Invitați și Utilizatori nu pot fi atribuiți Administratori de sală.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "rolul menționat" (the mentioned role) is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would be to just refer to the role directly or use "acest rol".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Invitați și Utilizatori nu pot fi atribuiți Administratori de sală. Numai administratori de sală și administratori {{productName}} pot atribui acest rol.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Numai administratori de sală și administratori {{productName}} pot fi atribuite rolul menționat." is grammatically incorrect. 'Atribuite' should match the plural subject.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Numai administratori de sală și administratori {{productName}} pot atribui acest rol.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Room managers' as 'Менеджерами комнат' is technically correct but slightly awkward. 'Менеджеры комнат' is a more natural and commonly used term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Менеджеры помещений

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Указанную роль могут выполнять" is grammatically correct, it's a bit formal and less conversational. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Данная роль могут выполнять

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "පරිශීලකයින්" (parishilakayin) is not the most accurate translation of "Users" in this context. A more appropriate translation would be "භාවිතකරුවන්" (bhavitakaruwan) or simply "භාවිතکنندگان" (bhavitakarakaruwan).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "පරිශීලකයින්" with "භාවිතකරුවන්" or "භාවිතکنندگان".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "භූමිකාව" (bhūmikāva) can be translated to 'role' in English, but here it might be more accurate to use 'ឋනාව' (thanāva) which refers specifically to a position or rank within a system, closer to 'designation'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "භූමිකාව" with "ឋනාව".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'assigned as' is not accurately translated. 'Označení' implies a marking or identification, not an assignment of a role.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hostia a používatelia nemôžu byť menovaní za manažérov miestnosti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'pridelená' means assigned in a more general sense. The term lacks the precision of role assignment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Iba administrátorom miestnosti a administrátorom {{productName}} môže byť táto funkcia pridelená.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ni mogoče določiti' is too formal and clunky for this context. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning with more user-friendly language.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gostov in uporabnikov ne moremo dodeliti za upravitelje sob.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The wording 'primerni za to vlogo' is a bit awkward. It implies suitability rather than permission. 'lahko opravljajo to vlogo' would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Samo skrbniki sobe in {{productName}} lahko opravljajo to vlogo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Корисници' is transliterated. While acceptable, 'Корисници' could be replaced with a more standard Serbian equivalent for 'Users' which might be 'Корисници' with a more consistent formatting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a consistently formatted 'Корисници'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'погодни за одређену улогу' is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to 'адекватно за ту улогу' or 'могу имати ту улогу'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "određena uloga" (specified role) is a bit clunky. A more natural and common phrasing in Serbian would be 'za tu ulogu' or 'za tu poziciju'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Gosti i Korisnici ne mogu biti postavljeni kao Menadžeri sobe. Samo administratori sobe i {{productName}} su pogodni za tu ulogu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit too literal. "được chỉ định" is repetitive and sounds unnatural. A more natural phrasing would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khách và Người dùng không thể làm người quản lý Phòng. Chỉ quản trị viên Phòng và {{productName}} mới có thể đảm nhận vai trò này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Phòng' is correct for 'Room,' the use of 'quản trị viên Phòng' feels redundant. 'quản trị viên' is already understood to refer to a Room administrator in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Khách và Người dùng không thể làm người quản lý Phòng. Chỉ quản trị viên {{productName}} mới có thể đảm nhận vai trò này.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Guests and Users" is translated as "访客和用户". While accurate, it's slightly less natural in this context. A more appropriate translation might convey the intended meaning of users who lack administrative privileges.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 无法指定非管理员用户为房间管理员。 (Wúfǎ zhǐdìng fēi guānzhōnghǎo yònghù wéi fángjiān guānlián. - Unable to specify non-administrator users as room managers.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "可担任该角色" is slightly formal and less conversational. It translates to 'can hold the role'. A more natural phrasing would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 只有房间管理员和{{productName}}管理员适合担任此角色。(Zhǐ yǒu fángjiān guānlián hé {{productName}} guānlián shìhé dānréng cǐ juésè. - Only room administrators and {{productName}} administrators are suitable for this role.)
